example.name: autogen1
example.text: the displacing of the old `` our crowd '' Jewish Wall Street banking grandees by such new business barons as Saul Steinberg , Carl Icahn , Sanford Weill and Bruce Wasserstein

by such new business barons as Saul Steinberg , Carl Icahn , Sanford Weill and Bruce Wasserstein
